titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: COST CENTRE CODE FOR NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE - Description

div.p: The Integrated Single Finance System (ISFE) cost and revenue code for the department with budgetary responsibility for a NHS Continuing Healthcare care package.

For further information on the permitted Cost Centre Codes specified for NHS Continuing Healthcare and NHS-funded Nursing Care, see the NHS Shared Business Services website at: NHS Shared Business Services.
